Verses: 1 thekkovaa Oor Meypparukkul Irundha Aamos, Yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Usiyaavin Naatkalilum, Isravelin Raajaavaagiya Yovaasudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Erobeyaamin Naatkalilum, Boomi Adhirchchi Undaaga Irandu Varushaththukku Munne, Isravelaikkuriththu Dharisanankandu Sonna Vaarththaigal.
2 karththar Seeyonilirundhu Gerchchiththu, Erusalemilirundhu Saththamiduvaar; Adhinaal Meypparin Thaabarangal Dhukkankondaadum; Karmelin Kodumudiyum Kaaindhupogum.

3 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Thamaskuvinudaiya Moondru Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naalu Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naan Adhin Aakkinaiyaith Thiruppamaatten; Avargal Keeleyaaththai Iruppuk Karuvigalinaal Poradiththaargale.
4 aasagelin Veettile Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Penaadhaaththin Aramanaigalaip Patchikkum.

5 naan Thamaskuvin Thaazhppaalai Udaiththu, Kudigalai Aaven Ennum Pallaththaakkilum, Sengol Seluththugiravanaip Pethedhenilum Iraadhapadikku Sangaarampannuven; Appozhudhu Seeriyaavin Janangal Keerukku Siraippattuppovaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

6 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Kaadhsaavinudaiya Moondru Paadhangalinimiththamum, Naalu Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naan Adhin Aakkinaiyaith Thiruppamaatten; Avargal Siraippattavargalai Edhomiyaridaththil Oppuvikkumpadi Muzhudhum Siraiyaakkinaargale.
7 kaadhsaavin Madhilukkul Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Adhinudaiya Aramanaigalaip Patchikkum.

8 naan Kudigalai Asthoththilum, Sengol Seluththugiravanai Askalonilum Iraadhapadikku Sangaarampanni, Pelistharil Meedhiyaanavargal Azhiyumpadikku En Kaiyai Ekronukku Virodhamaagath Thiruppuvenendru Karththaraagiya Aandavar Sollugiraar.

9 melum: Theeruvinudaiya Moondru Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naalu Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naan Adhin Aakkinaiyaith Thiruppamaatten; Avargal Sagodharan Udanpadikkaiyai Ninaiyaamal, Siraippattavargalai Muzhudhum Edhomiyar Kaiyil Oppiththaargale.
10 theeruvin Madhilukkul Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Adhin Aramanaigalaip Patchikkum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

11 melum: Edhomudaiya Moondru Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naalu Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naan Avan Aakkinaiyaith Thiruppamaatten; Avan Than Sagodharanaip Pattayaththode Thodarndhu, Than Manadhai Irakkamatradhaakki, Than Kobaththinaale Endraikkum Avanaip Peerippottu, Than Moorkkaththai Niththiyakaalamaaga Vaiththirukkiraane.
12 themaanile Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Posraavin Aramanaigalaip Patchikkum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.

13 karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal: Ammon Puththirarin Moondru Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naalu Paadhagangalinimiththamum, Naan Avargal Aakkinaiyaith Thiruppamaatten; Avargal Thangal Ellaigalai Visthaaramaakkumpadikkuk Keeleyaa Dhesaththin Karppasthreegalaik Keerippottaargale.
14 rappaavin Madhilukkul Theekkoluththuven; Adhu Yuththanaalin Muzhakkamaagavum, Perungaatrin Pusalaagavum Adhin Aramanaigalaip Patchikkum.
15 avargaludaiya Raajaavum, Avanudaiya Adhipadhigalum Siraippattuppovaargal Endru Karththar Sollugiraar.
